abstract: Illinois Department of Health announces two deaths from Legionnaires' disease at Illinois Veterans' Home in Quincy; other outbreaks around United States discussed.
lead_paragraph: The two were among 23 residents of an Illinois veterans’ home who had contracted the disease. In California, a prison inmate was hospitalized with a confirmed case.

headline.main: Illinois: Two Are Dead in Outbreak of Legionnaires’ Disease
headline.print_headline: Two Are Dead in Outbreaks of Legionnaires’ Disease

snippet: The two were among 23 residents of an Illinois veterans’ home who had contracted the disease. In California, a prison inmate was hospitalized with a confirmed case.
